title: Nossa Senhora da Boa Viagem (Chapels of)
original_title: Nossa Senhora da Boa Viagem (Capelas de)
body:
In the place called Carne Azeda in the parish of Santa Luzia, Manuel Pestana Teixeira and his wife Francisca Xavier da Conceição founded a chapel of this invocation in 1711, which was inspected for the purpose of celebrating the acts of worship on June 28 of the same year.

In the parish of Santa Maria Maior, on the street that still bears the name Boa Viagem, there was a chapel of the same invocation, founded by Bento da Veiga. We do not know the date of its foundation, but we know it was a very old construction. Somewhere we read that it was a building of interesting and characteristic construction, as well as a house adjacent to it. It is affirmed that the first customs house and later the first butcher's shop in the municipality were installed in this house. The desecrated chapel that is now found on Boa Viagem street is not the chapel of this invocation to which we refer here.

Nossa Senhora do Bom Despacho (Chapel of). This chapel exists in the parish of Campanário, founded in 1672 by the lord Jerónimo de Atouguia Bettencourt and his wife D. Catarina Espranger, with the endowment deed dated June 27 of that year. In 1762, it was rebuilt by Father Francisco Nicolau de Brito, at that time belonging to a brother of this priest. It now belongs to Feliciano de Brito Correia, a representative of this family (1921).

Manuel Pestana Teixeira: Founder of the chapel in the parish of Santa Luzia
Bento da Veiga: Founder of the chapel in the parish of Santa Maria Maior
Jerónimo de Atouguia Bettencourt: Founder of the chapel in Campanário
D. Catarina Espranger: Wife of Jerónimo de Atouguia Bettencourt
Father Francisco Nicolau de Brito: Responsible for the rebuilding of the chapel

1711: Year of the foundation of the chapel in the parish of Santa Luzia
1672: Year of the foundation of the chapel in Campanário
1762: Year of the rebuilding of the chapel in Campanário
1921: Year in which the chapel belonged to Feliciano de Brito Correia
